scripts.migrate:status: curl http://localhost:3000/api/migrate || echo 'Please start the dev server first (npm run dev)'
scripts.migrate:run: curl -X POST http://localhost:3000/api/migrate -H 'Content-Type: application/json' -d '{"action":"migrate"}' || echo 'Please start the dev server first (npm run dev)'
scripts.migrate:verify: curl -X POST http://localhost:3000/api/migrate -H 'Content-Type: application/json' -d '{"action":"verify"}' || echo 'Please start the dev server first (npm run dev)'
